critter.name: Citrus Long-Horned Beetle
critter.desc: The citrus long-horned beetle is a putrid pest and a grave threat to trees. Hoo! It's true! Adults possess powerful jaws and use them to chomp through hardwood and plant fibers with ease. The little larvae are no better, boring bullet-like holes into innocent trees with gustoâ€”citrus trees especially. Voracious and vile, indeed!
